publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4483 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees— (a) the following revision to the programme of business for Wednesday 24 June 2009— delete 2.30 pm Continuation of Stage 3 Proceedings: Climate Change (Scotland) Bill and insert 1.45 pm Continuation of Stage 3 Proceedings: Climate Change (Scotland) Bill and (b) the following revision to the programme of business for Thursday 25 June 2009— after followed by Stage 1 Debate: Arbitration (Scotland) Bill insert followed by Legislative Consent Motion: Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) Bill – UK Legislation
